channel.title: Need HELP WITH SHOPS IM SURE ITS SIMPLE
channel.description: Hey I have a slight problem. I just started coding and the first thing i wanted to no was how to make a shop. so i spawned a character named sam and I went to client did the whole zeke thing where i switch the thing. I then went to shops and put the code for a potion and about 100 of em. when i compile its successful and when i run its the same. the character is there. w00t! but when i click trade it trades but i dont see the shop title or any items..

item.title: Need HELP WITH SHOPS IM SURE ITS SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

Are you sure you added the items to the correct shop?
